name: Dedication for public facilities as condition to development
text: §206E-12  Dedication for public facilities as condition to development.  The authority shall establish rules requiring dedication for public facilities of land or facilities, or cash payments in lieu thereof, by developers as a condition of developing real property pursuant to the community development plan.  Where state and county public facilities dedication laws, ordinances, or rules differ, the provision for greater dedication shall prevail. [L 1976, c 153, pt of §1; am L 1984, c 15, §1]
